creator: kare@w4.dion.ne.jp
text:
When jsp compile error occurs, the error message print incorrect characters.
This is a cause with the error message of javac in Japanese on my environment.
This problem is solved by adding appropriate charset to content-type 
corresponding to JVM default encoding of the platform(ex. Japanese -> 
Shift_JIS).

creator: kare@w4.dion.ne.jp
text:
Created attachment 22
Patch for Bug 691 create by Kazuhiko Kazama
